name: Zombie Conspiracy - Premium Edition
description:
ZOMBIE CONSPIRACY PREMIUM SUPPORTER'S EDITION

BY ORDERDING THE PREMIUM EDITION OF ZOMBIE CONSPIRACY, YOU SUPPORT MY NEXT GAME'S DEVELOPMENT CYCLE.

Zombie Conspiracy: Fight endless rounds against ruthless zombies, collect cash to open doors, buy perks, Pack-A-Punch your gun, & More!

Zombie Conspiracy Borrows many awesome concepts from COD Zombies, for example: Pack-A-Punch, Perks, Drops like instakill, maxammo, extracash, doublepoints, nuke, deathmachine & more.

DeadEagle.nl
